Text:
19 completed downloads and not one comment?

Please let me know if the disk worked for you or not.

This disk worked for me.  I loaded Vista Home Basic onto a brand new drive in a friend's Acer laptop.  Apparently computer manufacturers don't provide restore disks anymore.  Her hard drive died when the computer got dropped.  You still need a registration code, which I had because it was on a sticker on the bottom of the laptop.

Hi - I may be being a dumbass, but how do I get this to run? I've copied the image to a CD, but no autorun and none of the files are executable?
Would really appreaciate help - thanks
hey if you get a sec i burned windows vista tried to install but came up with this windows cannot open the required file F:\Sources\install.wim.
